overview: ONE Championship: Only the Brave was a Combat sport event held by ONE Championship on January 28, 2022, at the Singapore Indoor Stadium in Kallang, Singapore.  The main event will feature an interim Heavyweight title fight between the Russian Anatoly Malykhin and the Belarusian Kiril Grishenko. The event will also feature the semi finals for the ONE Kickboxing Featherweight Grand Prix.
title: ONE Championship: Only the Brave
